name: morganatic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A morganatic marriage is one in which one partner is of higher social rank, and the other cannot claim this partner's title or possessions or pass them to their children: a morganatic marriage/union the Archduke Franz Ferdinand's morganatic wife, Sophie Chotek
